founder.title: Meet Alona — Founder & Esthetician
founder.introduction: When a woman chooses self-care — she chooses trust. And I’m here to honor that trust.
founder.story:
My name is Alona — I’m a licensed esthetician, laser specialist, and the founder of CosmarSpa Med Beauty. What I offer is not just aesthetics. It’s where science meets sensitivity, and where personalized attention meets professional care.

My journey began in medicine — in critical care, working with patients in the most fragile states. Over time, I expanded my knowledge in skincare, laser and device-based techniques, and developed a strong foundation in facial anatomy, aging processes, and aesthetic methods — including injectable approaches gained through international training.

questions.question: How should I prepare for my facial appointment?
questions.answer: Arrive with a clean face and avoid wearing makeup. Inform your esthetician about any skin sensitivities or allergies.

questions.question: What is the recommended frequency for facials?
questions.answer: Generally, it's best to get a facial every 4–6 weeks to maintain healthy skin and target specific concerns.

questions.question: Can I get a facial if I have sensitive skin?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer treatments tailored for sensitive skin using gentle, calming products. Just inform your esthetician beforehand.

questions.question: Is laser hair removal painful?
questions.answer: Most clients describe it as a mild snapping sensation. We use modern technology to ensure your comfort throughout the procedure.

questions.question: How many laser hair removal sessions will I need?
questions.answer: It typically takes 6–8 sessions for long-lasting results, depending on your skin type and hair color.

questions.question: Can I book multiple services in one visit?
questions.answer: Absolutely. You can combine treatments like facials, waxing, and massages in a single session. Just let us know in advance.

questions.question: Are your treatments safe during pregnancy?
questions.answer: Many of our services are safe during pregnancy, but please consult your doctor and inform us before your appointment.

questions.question: Do you offer personalized treatment plans?
questions.answer: Yes, each session is tailored to your skin goals and needs. We assess your skin and recommend the best approach for you.

questions.question: How can I maintain results between visits?
questions.answer: We’ll recommend a personalized home skincare routine and lifestyle tips to help you keep your results longer.

questions.question: Is there parking available at the salon?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer convenient on-site parking for all our clients.
